text: Bible Bloc Party (Hebrew: Gush HaTanachi) is a political party in Israel. ==History== The party was created by Dennis Lipkin, a veteran speaker to Evangelical Christians in the US and a well-known lecturer who has spoken in over 1,000 churches. It will run for the Knesset, seeking the vote of non- Jewish Russian immigrants from the former Soviet Union and Christian Arabs. ==References== Category:Political parties in Israel Category:Christian political parties
title: Bible Bloc Party
